page.title: 16MACKAYS CARPET FACTORY
page.content: The internationally famous mackays carpet factory is situated on the periphery of the Dragonville Industrial Estate at Gilesgate. The factory was formerly situated in Durham centre but moved its premisis after a fire. This factory designs and weaves special order carpet as well as standard production high quality carpet. After the Q.E.2 and the Canberra finished their tour in the Falklaands war Mackays of Durham was awarded the contract to recarpet the ships. The carpet in the entrance hall of the county hotel was also specially made here.
